entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't connect from MS Visual Studio to MAC #20931
  • iOS 17.4, Barometer.Default.Start hangs indefinately #20930
  • [iOS] DataTrigger fires on first Entry for no apparent reason #20927
  • [Testing, Windows] Add tests to validate DataTemplateSelector WinUI #20926
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Shadow Doesn't Work on Grid on Android #20922
  • Regression Bug. Nested ScrollView does not work in Android. Works in iOS. #20920
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Entry control CursorPosition does not update on TextChanged event [iOS Maui 8.0.7] #20911
  • StyleClass can not be cleared #20907

Closed

  • [iOS] AbsoluteLayout not rendering child elements #18956
    Backlog
  • Referencing a dynamic color in a DataTrigger does not work. #13570
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0] DynamicResource not working with gradients when switching themes at runtime #18545
  • DefaultAccessible seems to have the wrong default value #17582
  • It's impossible on Android to assign 0 value to the Button CornerRadius: <Button ... CornerRadius="0" ... /> #20923
  • DataTemplateSelector on CollectionView is completely broken - templates don't match BindingContext #12988
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • CollectionView view DataTemplateSelector takes random layout when scroll on Windows #20842
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Windows: Switch shows On/OffContent text #20486
  • Can't open Picker/DatePicker Programatically with .Focus() like i used to do in Xamarin.Forms. #20913
  • [Windows] Registering new double-tap event can end up in the event firing multiple times #20903
  • Pusblish fails on Mac #20918
  • SearchBar ShowsCancelButton iOS platform-specific Bindable Property #20919
  • [Bug] Unexpected behavior when InvalidateMeasure is invoked in Android #3102
    Backlog
  • Make BindableProperty trim-compatible #4997
    Backlog
  • Migration from Xamarin to MAUI - Title bar is not coming in children pages and tabs pages #17126
  • Mohammedahmedali078@gmail.com #20910
  • it working ,but now when this is errur Gravité Code Description Projet Fichier Ligne État de la suppression Erreur NU1012 La version de la plateforme n'est pas présente pour un ou plusieurs frameworks cibles, même s'ils ont spécifié une plateforme : net8.0-ios, net8.0-maccatalyst MauiApp1 C:\Users\cc\Desktop\MauiApp1\MauiApp1\MauiApp1.csproj 1 #20593
  • Conflicting values for resource 'Files/Microsoft.Maui/Platform/Windows/Styles/WindowRootViewStyle.xbf' #20592
  • Connectivity.Current.ConnectivityChanged += Connectivity_ConnectivityChanged; event is not raised #20645
  • What should be done to make Maui WebView renders last page instead of home page of the domain when web token expires? #17065
  • Dotnet command not found MAC OS #20629

PullRequests

Created

  • [XC] Compile StaticResource when possible #20917
    area/Xaml </>
  • [X] Allow using x:Type and type literals interchangeably in certain scenarios #20915
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Docs] Update Shell inline docs #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • [Trimming] Use typed bindings internally #20567
    area/Xaml </>
  • [C] Propagate Resource changes to Background #20637
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️
  • Restore iOS/macOS SecureStorage.DefaultAccessible default value #20914
    area/essentials 🍞, migration-compatibility
  • [Windows] Fix template check for item recycle #20875
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, i/regression
  • Remove Switch On/Off content #20487
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Update aotprofile #20901
  • Updated Development guide #20543
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ci] Try make it faster net9 #20925
  • [Testing] Added categories to Controls.AppiumTests #20642
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Windows] Registering new double-tap event can end up in the event being firing more times than expected #20905
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area/gestures
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Update all dependencies #20879
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [ci] Enable 1ES PT #20728
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android, iOS, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #20460
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Generalize HideSoftInputOnTapped on Android and iOS to support 3rd party input controls #19626
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/keyboard
  • added Command and CommandParameter on CheckBox #20717
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-checkbox
  • Document ICanvas #20881
    area/docs 📓
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • Update Maps Project API Docs #20893
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/Maps🗺
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
